text: Star Trek Beyond is a 2016 American science fiction action movie directed by Justin Lin, written by Simon Pegg and Doug Jung, and based on the television series Star Trek created by Gene Roddenberry. It is the 13th movie in the Star Trek movie franchise and the third part in the reboot series. It stars Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Simon Pegg, Karl Urban, Zoe Saldana, John Cho, Anton Yelchin, and Idris Elba, with Leonard Nimoy, who died in 2015, appearing in a photo. This was one of Anton Yelchin's last movies; he died in June 2016, a month before the movie's release. The movie was dedicated to both Nimoy and Yelchin. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Official database website * Category:Star Trek movies Category:2016 science fiction movies Category:2016 action movies Category:2010s LGBT movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in the 24th century Category:Movies directed by Justin Lin Category:Movies composed by Michael Giacchino
title: Star Trek Beyond
